WNYN
WNYO
December 20, 1941
Mr. Frank 13. Schooley, Executive Secretary
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Prank:
Will you please do me a favor and let me know
who, at our recent meeting, submitted what I thought a
swell report on how recordings should be kept.
When I came back, I gave our Chief Engineer
his name and he tells me that he has written but re¬
ceived no answer from him. Mr. Brimberg still insists
that piling one record on the other is all right. This
doesn't sound right to me and I'd appreciate it if you
would check this for me.
Yours sincerely.
Director
MSN:sd
NEW YORK
WORLD’S FAIR 1940
'New York City's Own Station"—810 Kc.
